docs.text: cats-process is a library for purely functional command and process execution in the Scala language. It is available for Scala 2.12 and Scala 2.13. cats-process is built upon two major functional libraries for Scala, cats, and cats-effect.
docs.title: cats-process

docs.text: To start using cats-process, add the following dependencies to your build.sbt:
docs.title: Getting started

docs.text:
sbt libraryDependencies += "io.github.cats4scala" %% "cats-process" % "0.0.2" Maven <dependency>
  <groupId>io.github.cats4scala</groupId>
  <artifactId>cats-process_2.13</artifactId>
  <version>0.0.2</version>
</dependency> Gradle dependencies {
  compile group: 'io.github.cats4scala', name: 'cats-process_2.13', version: '0.0.2'
}
docs.title: Stable version

docs.text:
sbt libraryDependencies += "io.github.cats4scala" %% "cats-process" % "0.0.2+19-fe87e922-SNAPSHOT" Maven <dependency>
  <groupId>io.github.cats4scala</groupId>
  <artifactId>cats-process_2.13</artifactId>
  <version>0.0.2+19-fe87e922-SNAPSHOT</version>
</dependency> Gradle dependencies {
  compile group: 'io.github.cats4scala', name: 'cats-process_2.13', version: '0.0.2+19-fe87e922-SNAPSHOT'
}
docs.title: Latest snapshot
